org.threadly.concurrent.future

Class FutureListenableFuture<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.concurrent.future.FutureFuture<T>
      • org.threadly.concurrent.future.FutureListenableFuture<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - result type returned by .get()
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Future<T>, ListenableFuture<T>

    public class FutureListenableFuture<T>
extends FutureFuture<T>
implements ListenableFuture<T>
    ListenableFuture implementation which contains a parent ListenableFuture. This allows a future to be returned before an executor has actually produced a future which this class will rely on.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.threadly.concurrent.future.FutureFuture

        FutureFuture.TaskCanceler

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener)
        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Add a listener to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. Listeners from this call will execute on the same thread the result was produced on.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface ListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to run when the computation is complete

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener,
               java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Add a listener to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface ListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to run when the computation is complete
        executor - executor listener should be called on
